title: Rotational kinematics - angular vel of turntable

content.question: What is the angular velocity <math alttext="omega" overflow="scroll"><mi>ω</mi></math> of the turntable as a function of time?

choices.label: <math alttext="omega of t equals, 12 fifths, times, t raised to the five halves power, minus t squared, plus 2 pi t" overflow="scroll"><mi>ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>12</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>t</mi><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="omega of t equals, 9 times t raised to the one half power, minus 2" overflow="scroll"><mi>ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math>

<math alttext="omega of t equals, 6 times t to the one half power, minus 2" overflow="scroll"><mi>ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math>

<math alttext="omega of t equals, nine halves times, t raised to the negative one half power" overflow="scroll"><mi>ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>t</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="omega of t equals, 9 times t raised to the one half power, minus 2" overflow="scroll"><mi>ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
